title: Which college should I choose among Dyal Singh (DU) and PGDAV (DU)? - Quora
tags: Dyal Singh College, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: Obviously Dyal Singh College….!!! I am also a 3rd year student of DSC(M) and this is what all I have experienced in the past 2 years of my college life. Despite being a south campus college, Dyal Singh offers many perks to it's students. Few listings are: (1) POSH LOCATION Having said that , Dyal Singh College is situated at LODHI ROAD , Delhi’s one of the most posh areas. College is surrounded by lots of tourist attractions like – Lodhi Gardens, Safdarjung Tomb, Humayun Tomb, Indian habitat centre, Khan Market and many more. You can always utilize your free time between classes by visiting such places with your friends over & over again, and never get bored of it .  (2) HUGE CAMPUS Dyal Singh College has the largest campus and building among all the south campus colleges with huge strength of students. Yes , you will always explore one or the other new points inside the college to chill out with your friends, even till the end of graduation. You will never get bore of the usual hang out points inside the college and never run out of gossips and chit chat with your buddies in free time.  (3) DELICIOUS SNACK POINTS Always hungry right? No worries . Just at the entrance of the college you’ll find some amazing food joints , The famous “LOVE DI HATTI” & “MAGGI POINT” will never disappoint your tummy . That “Ghar ka Khana” vali feel will always strike you whenever you visit these joints. Plus the college canteen also provides delicious food and that to at reasonable prices. Food is life for college students, Right?  (4) TALENTED & DIFFERENT SOCIETIES Dyal Singh is always known for amazing talents from different states which is highlighted by the societies . College provides “ ZEST “ – the extraordinary dance talent , “ GLAMORRATTI” – the most stylish Fashion society , “ ROOTS “ – the melodious Music society , “ THE PLACEMENT CELL “ –the internships & jobs Provider of Dyal Singh , “ASTITVA“ –the Drama society , “JAMINI” –the Creative Arts society , “XPOSURE “ –the Photography society ,“COMSOC” –the most hardworking and responsible commerce society you’ll ever experience.  (5) FRIENDLY & SUPPORTIVE TEACHERS With a bunch of amazing teachers , Dyal Singh always wins Students heart . You will find friendly teachers in almost all the departments, who will support you throughout your college life. Mind it no teacher (exceptions) in the college is really concerned about how well you are doing. But honestly, Faculty of Dyal Singh College has always helped students in and out the semester.  P.S: ∆ Dyal Singh College is NAAC Accredited (Grade A), which pgdav is not. ∆ Fees is rather low in Dyal Singh College(INR 27585) as compared to Pgdav(INR 54810) for B.com hons. ( Estimation based on first year's fees) ∆ Dyal Singh College has 208 seats as compared to 186 of Pgdav in b.com hons. ∆ Infrastructure n facilities are also better at Dyal Singh College.

It depends on the course you are looking for. I have done my graduation in BCOM (Hons.) from Dyal Singh College. So, I feel that I am competent to answer this question. As long as you are looking to join course in commerce, join Dyal Singh College. Commerce department of the college is quite good. Department organises seminars and workshops on regular basis for soft skills development and awareness programmes about future academics. Fests organized are also good.Placement cell is also very active. It provides a lot of opportunities for the internships and job placements. Big 4’s like KPMG and E&Y come to recruit students and 30–40 students are hired by each. For reference I am sharing Facebook page link Log In or Sign Up to ViewTeachers faculty of the college is very competent with good experience.Infrastructure of the college is better than 90% of all the colleges in DU. it includes big library, spacious classrooms, big grounds with basketball courts etc.One of my friend was in PGDAV and he told me that there college didn't provide them the opportunity for placements in Big 4. I suggest you to take admission in Dyal Singh College over PGDAV.
